# AlertBox
```import { AlertBox } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

AlertBox is available for any length of text, as well as an optional dismiss button. <br/>
There are 3 styling types: **success**, **warning**, **danger**. For example type="success". <br/>
To make AlerBox responsive, you can add props **responsive**.
You also can customize the animation with: **fade**, **slide**, or **false**.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-alert-box--basic" />
</Preview>

## Stories
### Dismissable

To add a dismiss button, add props **toggle** with toggle function and add props **isOpen** to set the alert open or closed. <br/>
You can see this in action with a live demo:
<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-alert-box--dismissable" />
</Preview>
